summary: Email from attorney Thomas Moyer to the SDNY, transmitting an additional production of documents from Deutsche Bank in response to a July 11, 2019 subpoena. The email includes a cover letter and secure access to a document package.

persons.name: Thomas Moyer
persons.context: Attorney at Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP who is transmitting documents from Deutsche Bank to the SDNY in response to a subpoena.

events.title: SDNY Subpoena to Deutsche Bank
events.description: The SDNY issued a subpoena to Deutsche Bank, likely as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Deutsche Bank Document Production
events.description: Deutsche Bank, through its attorney Thomas Moyer, submitted an additional production of documents to the SDNY in response to the July 11 subpoena.

locations: 2001 K Street N.W., Washington, DC 20006 (Akin Gump office)
keyFacts: Deutsche Bank was subpoenaed by the SDNY on July 11, 2019, as part of the Epstein investigation.
Attorney Thomas Moyer of Akin Gump transmitted a document production from Deutsche Bank to the SDNY on July 19, 2019.
The document production was transmitted securely via Citrix Files, indicating sensitive financial or investigative material.
The communication confirms Deutsche Bank's cooperation with the SDNY's investigation into Epstein.
